name: get_task
description: Get a specific task definition by ID. Searches both space-specific and global locations with hierarchical fallback (space → global). Can optionally specify the agent to narrow the search.

agent.description: Optional: Agent ID to narrow the search (e.g., 'budget_tracker')

target_space.description: Optional: Target a specific named space (e.g., 'creative', 'education'). Defaults to current space.

search_global.description: Whether to search in global data as fallback (default: true)

search_space.description: Whether to search in space-specific data first (default: true)
